title: Jon Bostic is ready if needed with Dont'a Hightower on the mend
text:
Published By: Boston Herald Sports - Today 
INDIANAPOLIS -- Linebacker Jon Bostic wore street clothes during his first game as a Patriot, but he is ready to trade in the casual look fo...
